text: The 2015 Copa EuroAmericana was the third edition of Copa EuroAmericana, a men's football friendly tournament created by DirecTV. This edition took place in South America on May 28 - August 1, 2015. Five teams, Barcelona S.C., Deportivo CaliDeportivo Cali jugará contra Málaga en la Copa Euroamericana and Peñarol from CONMEBOL and RCD Espanyol and Málaga CF from UEFA, participated in it. South America won the cup after three victories. ==Format== Each match is played all 90 minutes. In case of a tie after the 90 minutes, the winner will be defined through penalty kicks.
